name: Centipede Hunter
description:
You play as a astronaut, whose job it is to hunt the centipede which is roaming around the void. Aim for the head, for you might not like it if you destroy it's body...

This is my entry for my second game jam: The Pygame Community Easter Jam. I tried to do an action based game, inspired by the arcade game centipede.

I hope you all like it :D
